price: 27 Seul demeurera le Visage, tout de majesté et de gloire, de ton Seigneur.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
